desc.en: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.jp: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.thai: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.ko: Despite the Kaiser director's outrage, Sensei, the Foreclosure Task Force, and Problem Solver make use of the sudden turn of events to launch a counteroffensive against the PMC forces.
desc.zh_tw: 凱薩理事對這意想不到的狀況非常氣憤。而老師則指揮對策委員會和便利屋學生對抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥对策委员会和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The PMC forces finally retreat following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.jp: The PMC forces finally retreat following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.thai: The PMC forces finally retreat following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.ko: The PMC forces finally retreat following an arduous battle. Later, Sensei seeks out Black Suit personally to negotiate Hoshino's return.
desc.zh_tw: 混戰結束後PMC士兵撤退。老師為了尋找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西裝人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 混战结束后PMC士兵撤退。老师为了寻找解救星野的方法，直接去找黑色西装人。

desc.en: The director was both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insulted them back. Sensei confronted the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director didn't step back. Everyone was forced to engage the enemies..
desc.jp: The director was both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insulted them back. Sensei confronted the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director didn't step back. Everyone was forced to engage the enemies..
desc.thai: The director was both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insulted them back. Sensei confronted the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director didn't step back. Everyone was forced to engage the enemies..
desc.ko: The director was both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insulted them back. Sensei confronted the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director didn't step back. Everyone was forced to engage the enemies..
desc.zh_tw: 理事對便利屋68背叛他們又驚又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老師對峙理事，要求將星野還回來，但後者並未讓步。不得已，一行人繼續應戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 理事对便利屋68背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将星野还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 理事对便利屋68背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将星野还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 理事对便利屋68背叛他们又惊又怒，但便利屋一行人予以了回敬。老师对峙理事，要求将星野还回来，但后者并未让步。不得已，一行人继续应战。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.thai: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.ko: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: As the director injured during the combat, the director gave a command of retreating with the advice of a solider. Everyone decided to go back and come up with a plan to rescue Hoshino.
desc.jp: As the director injured during the combat, the director gave a command of retreating with the advice of a solider. Everyone decided to go back and come up with a plan to rescue Hoshino.
desc.thai: As the director injured during the combat, the director gave a command of retreating with the advice of a solider. Everyone decided to go back and come up with a plan to rescue Hoshino.
desc.ko: As the director injured during the combat, the director gave a command of retreating with the advice of a solider. Everyone decided to go back and come up with a plan to rescue Hoshino.
desc.zh_tw: 由於理事在戰鬥中受傷，在士兵的建議下，理事下令撤退。一行人決定先回去想出解救星野的辦法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于理事在战斗中受伤，在士兵的建议下，理事下令撤退。一行人决定先回去想出解救星野的办法。

desc.en: That night, Sensei arrived in front of a building. At the top-floor office, Sensei met the Black Suit.
desc.jp: That night, Sensei arrived in front of a building. At the top-floor office, Sensei met the Black Suit.
desc.thai: That night, Sensei arrived in front of a building. At the top-floor office, Sensei met the Black Suit.
desc.ko: That night, Sensei arrived in front of a building. At the top-floor office, Sensei met the Black Suit.
desc.zh_tw: 晚上，老師來到了一幢大樓前。在頂層辦公室，老師遇到了黑服。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 晚上，老师来到了一幢大楼前。在顶层办公室，老师遇到了黑服。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 晚上，老师来到了一幢大楼前。在顶层办公室，老师遇到了黑服。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 晚上，老师来到了一幢大楼前。在顶层办公室，老师遇到了黑服。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.thai: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.ko: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
